name: linted
description: ESLint mono-plugin bundler with strict, opinionated defaults for (Stylistic) JavaScript, TypeScript, Svelte, HTML, Tailwind/CSS, JSON, JSONC, YAML, and Mocha.

scripts.clean: cmd --% /c "(if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist) & (if exist build rmdir /s /q build) & (if exist .eslintcache del /f /q .eslintcache)" || rm -rf dist build .eslintcache
scripts.build: cmd /c "(if exist svelte.config.js (npm run build:svelte) else (npm run build:ts))" || bash -c 'if [ -f svelte.config.js ]; then npm run build:svelte; else npm run build:ts; fi'
scripts.postbuild: npm run lint || echo "Lint failed. Continuing..."
scripts.start: cmd --% /c "(if exist svelte.config.js (npm run start:svelte) else (npm run start:ts))" || bash -c 'if [ -f svelte.config.js ]; then npm run start:svelte; else npm run start:ts; fi'
scripts.publish:release: cmd --% /c "for /f "delims=-" %a in ("%npm_package_version%") do if "%a" == "%npm_package_version%" (npm publish) else (npm publish --tag=next)" || bash -c 'if [ "${npm_package_version#*-}" = "${npm_package_version}" ]; then npm publish; else npm publish --tag=next; fi'
